# MTLMutability.default

**Case**

The default behavior, based on the buffer’s type.

## Declaration

```swift
case `default`
```

## Enumeration cases

- **MTLMutability.mutable**: An option that states that you can modify the buffer’s contents.
- **MTLMutability.immutable**: An option that states that you can’t modify the buffer’s contents.

items.description: An option that states that you can modify the buffer’s contents.
items.name: MTLMutability.mutable

items.description: An option that states that you can’t modify the buffer’s contents.
